title: Free Pool Party Skins at [LINK REMOVED] WARNING! FREE SKINS!!!
body:
So i've been referred to that site and I was soooo Happy coz i had like already half the points for my skin .... and I was happy coz all I have are 3 skins.. and i play since 2010 :(
Nobody ever gifts me coz i'm not a girl :'(

BUT... many friends write me and say they don't believe that and etc etc and some say it's fake. and that it's not riot site. 
And yes I agree it's not the riot site, but since it was full of league of legends links and stuff on the top I believed in that because i thought maybe they made a seperate site for the points etc.

BUT...
Look at 
[LINK REMOVED]

and look at the original [League of Legends Site](http://whois.icann.org/en/lookup?name=leagueoflegends.com)

League of Legends is registered under league of legends organization etc etc. nothing hidden.
And Pool Party Skin thing is registered in Panama and You can't even see who it belongs to.. why protect it? 
Obviously coz what he is doing is scam.

Oh and they use different Registrars.. well that isn't that weird maybe

Aww... skins :'(


EDIT: THE POINT IS, that it's FAKE.

read before writing shit.

replies.body:
wt.. so many people read this but nobody writes anything... xD
well be careful. what i learned from playing that game more then 5 years is... 
you NEVER get free stuff from Riot.. NEVER.. 
only got that free skin for annie and tristana that riot took away  (from liking their FB and youtube etc) 
and a skin from the 400 RP they gave before. and one skin for. i forgot what it was.
in 5 years. 1 skin and 400 RP..

for facebook friend invite.

i'm not complaining that i didnt get anything. the point of this post is that many people say that pool party is real.. i say itsn't not even real lsite.. and they say yes it is coz they can click on the top on other palces and they get to the site for pool party.

> [{quoted}](name=Funuken,realm=EUW,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=O83hnHLW,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-09T19:03:16.687+0000)

have you even read what i wrote? GTFO YOURSELF
iv collected points and send the link, now what, can my account get hacked or banned? please let me know i am worried {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Yes, your account is probably going to get hacked and, as a result, may get banned. Have you changed your log in info yet and run an anti-virus scan on your computer?
The title is a bait. Too bad people don't read it but there's an official announcement now.
Not real or official remove the link or gtfo
